page.title: 09CRICKET
page.content: CRICKET IS A GAME PLAYED BETWEEN TWO TEAMS EACH CONSISTING OF 11 PLAYERS. EACH TEAM HAS BOWLERS WHO DELIVER A BALL TO A BATSMEN ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE.THEY ALSO HAVE A WICKET KEEPER AND A SLIP OR TWO. THE GAME IS REFEREED BY TWO UMPIRES ONE STANDS BY THE WICKET AND THE OTHER BY THE SIDE OF THE SQUARE. THE OBJECT OF THE GAME IS TO DEFEND YOUR WICKET WHICH IS THREE PIECES OF WOOD STICKING UP FROM THE GROUND,AND TO SCORE RUNS BY RUNNING BETWEEN THE TWO WICKETS.THE GAME IS PLAYED WITH A HARD BALL MADE OUT OF LEATHER,BUT THE PLAYERS ARE PADDED OUT WELL ENOUGH TO PROTECT THEMSELVES. ONE TEAM HAS ELEVEN PLAYERS OUT ON THE FIELD(WHEN FIELDING) AND THE OTHER TEAM HAS TWO PLAYERS OUT ON THE FIELD WHEN BATTING.
